Title: The Darkness Within
Description:
You didn't see Captain Doren while you were out there, did you?

That sniveling Alliance leader must be in hiding somewhere. If he wasn't in that airbase, he can't be far. Search the perimeter - try searching the cave southwest of the main airfield. I want the Alliance gone from here!
PortraitGiverText: The entirety of Strongarm Airstrip reports to Doren. Take him down!
